runs.comm: oh would you believe it? Gambhir pushes a full delivery gently into the covers, there's some indecisiveness in the call, Gambhir then harries down and Pathan's struggling to make his ground, he flings himself and his bat forward as a good throw comes in to Kamran Akmal, and replays show he's just! Whew that was a dicy start to the innings
good length delivery on leg stump, clips Pathan on the pad, very high, and rolls towards point as Gambhir calls for the single
full on middle and off, tucked towards Gul at mid-on for a single
hello, thats gone! Great way to get your international career off to a start! Pathan stands his ground and clubs a length delivery straight back down the ground for half a dozen!
full toss this time, which he clips through mid-on for a well-run three
full and well down leg stump, Gambhir goes for the flick but misses
down leg again, this time he gets a tickle on it but cant beat short fine leg
full delivery on off stump, dug out to cover by Pathan
very wide down leg stump, Gambhir watches it go to Akmal
full down leg again and this time Gambhir flicks it well for four
another ball down leg stump, Gambhir makes contact but cant beat Akmal
back of a length outside off stump, comes in sharply but Gambhir tucks it fine for a single to bring Pathan back on strike
great length, pitching and angling across Pathan at a good height, beating him as he pokes at it off the front foot
good length again, no width on offer, and Pathan pushes to point
full, no real pace on it, Gambhir comes forward and steers it to backward point where Hafeez runs in and fields
half-volley outside off stump, pushed to Malik at mid-off for a single
loose ball, very wide and Pathan cracks it through point for four
gone this time! Pathan tries to pull a short delivery over midwicket but miscues it up in the air for mid-on to run back, keep his eyes on it under the sun, and pouch a simple enough catch
full down leg stump, clipping Gambhir's boot as he tries to flick, Akmal takes it and appeals very loudly
back of a length, still no threatening pace, Gambhir tucks it to midwicket
full down leg stump, flicked down to Asif on the boundary
full delivery, steered down to Asif at third man for one to get off the mark
full delivery, speared into leg stump, Gambhir manages to flick it into midwicket for another single, brushing into Tanvir as he runs
good length delivery outside off stump, defended to cover for a sharp single
back of a length on middle and leg, Gambhir tucks it to midwicket and Uthappa's eager on the single, they get it very easily too
short of a length, going away, Uthappa chases it and gets beaten by the bounce, wide signalled by the umpire
good length outside off stump, Uthappa gets onto the front foot and just pushes it very so softly in front of cover and calls for the sharp single
good length, tidy delivery, no movement, Uthappa defends with an inside-edge
safe hit, Uthappa seeing the length of a fuller delivery and driving it hard and over mid-off's head, just playing through the line and picking his spot
good length outside off, again he uses the soft hands to dab into the covers and calls for the run
back of a length on leg stump, tucked to backward square leg for one more
short delivery, kicking off the surface outside off, Uthappa commits himself to the front foot and gets beaten by the extra bounce
bouncer this time, forcing Uthappa down as he lets it pass safely
good slower ball, full on off stump, pushed uneasily into the covers
back of a length outside off stump, steered to Hafeez at backward point
good length, pushed into the covers, quick work there cuts off the single

another one goes! Uthappa tries to hit this one over the infield but totally mistimes it, lobbing it up into the air and Afridi doesnt have to move an inch at extra cover to hold  the simplest of catches
low full toss first-up, surprises him, he tucks it Younis at midwicket
back of a length, width, but Yuvraj crunches it to point
looped up full on leg stump, flicked wide of square leg for a couple
quick and wide, Gambhir goes for the dab but misses
full again, middle and leg, flicked to Nazir who's back on the circle
short of a length and Yuvraj chops it to short third man for one
short and wide, Gambhir gets back and cuts hard but cant beat Asif at extra cover
wide one again, cut hard between short third man and backward point, calls for the run, theres hesitation and he's struggling but the throw back to the bowler's just off and he makes it
tossed up wide, Gambhir flings the bat at but cant make contact
but theres contact on that one, as Gambhir cuts another wide delivery between point for four
short on off stump, he gets into shape to pull but hits it into his feet, very close to leg stumps
tossed up on a good length, Gambhir leans forward and pushes into the covers for the single that raises India's 50
flatter delivery outside off stump, driven off the backfoot to extra cover
flatter and fuller, he looks to on-drive but mistimes the shot, Hafeez moves across and fields
width outside off stump, quick ball, cut down to third man
fuller delivery, Yuvraj drives, taking one hand off the bat, but gets one to mid-off
fizzed up on middle and leg, Gambhir uses the feet and flicks, and his timing's perfect as the ball speeds across the fast outfield
hold back the length this time, Gambhir drives out to deep cover for one
tossed up wide, Yuvraj stands and chases it, gets beaten
quicker delivery, back of a length on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
tossed up, almost a low full toss, which he drives straight to cover
holds back the length, Yuvraj plays across the line but mistimes it to square leg
tossed up, wide, Gambhir uses the feet and drives this wonderfully through the gap at cover, he looks the better batsman against spin
short and wide, he gets over it and cuts well, both point and backward point get confused and dont know which will field and end up allowing two
a bit of width again, he cuts but cant beat backward point this time
good shot! Gambhir gets his front leg forward and creams a tossed up delivery on the up and gets it past a lacklustre mid-off, again the ball fairly races away
tossed up gently on off stump, Yuvraj looks to work it fine but gets beaten in the length, ends up pushing back to Afridi
tossed up again, leg stump, tucked fine to square leg for one
flatter one down leg stump, paddled for one
tossed up and Yuvraj clubs it over mid-off, good shot
width and he steers it to gully for one
good shot! Gambhir steps down and heaves this away over cow corner for six!
short of a length and well down the leg side, Yuvraj tries to heave it over long-leg and misses, through to the keeper, wide called. Not the best start from Gul
overpitched and on the leg side, Yuvraj walks into that one and flicks the ball through square-leg
just short of a driving length and on the off, Gul coming around the wicket now, this one pitches and straightens a touch, defended to point
short of a good length and on the stumps, Gambhir launches into the pull but is late on the shot and can only bottom edge the ball back down into the pitch
quick yorker on the leg stump, Gambhir can only get his feet out of the way and dig the ball out. After beginning with a wide Gul has pulled things back well in this over
short of a length and outside the off, a bit too much width on offer and Gambhir lays into it, slashing the ball over point and finding the gap.

full and outside the off, Gambhir opens the face of the bat and runs the ball past point to pick up a single that will take him to a half-century in the final of this ICC World Twenty20. Very significant knock from Gambhir who has more than 200 runs in the tournament
just short of a length and on the middle and leg, Gambhir comes down the pitch and drives awkwardly towards long-on
low full-toss on the stumps, Yuvraj tries to hit it really hard over the leg side but doesn't get hold of it
Gambhir comes down the pitch, takes the ball on the full and drives inside out through cover. That is a clever shot from a batsman in form.
another little shimmy down the pitch, chipped over the infield down towards long-off
fired in on the pads, Yuvraj can only drive back to the bowler
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out through cover
very full and a touch too straight, Gambhir frees his front leg and powers this one through midwicket. Top shot. Gambhir really picking his spots here.
low full-toss outside the off stump, driven inside out through cover

Gone! That's the big one for Pakistan. Yuvraj, who was a bit quiet against the spinners targets Umar Gul. Yuvraj goes for a big pull to a ball that's banged in about halfway down the pitcth. The ball gets a bit big on the batsman and takes the top edge and goes straight up in the air. Gul takes no chances, calls the catch his own and settles comfortably under it. That's a huge wicket for Pakistan in this big final
full-toss on the pads, swatted to the leg side
short of a length and outside the off, decent pace as well, cut played and missed, through to the keeper
low full-toss on the pads, Dhoni drives down the pitch but can't get hold of it
fullish and on the off, driven to the on side, it's played softly enough for the batsmen to come back for a second
another quick, flat one from Afridi, can't get it away at all
full and on the pads, worked away down to long-on, diving save from Asif
slightly short and on the off, dragged to the leg side for a single
full and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
beamer fired in, bang on target as well, Dhoni dives out of the way, no-ball called immediately as Gul apologises
short one banged in, good pace on the ball, the angle comes in to Dhoni as well and he does well just to sway out of the way. Excellent bowling this from Gul

Gul on fire! Another big, big wicket for Pakistan as Dhoni has an almighty heave at a full ball and does not quite make contact. The ball is coming in with the angle and homing in on the stumps. If Dhoni had connected that was going out of the ground. As it happens the stumps are shattered and it is Dhoni who has to leave the playing arena
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to third-man with an angled bat
low full-toss on the stumps, clipped to the on side  for a single. India need more than singles now but they're losing wickets at regular intervals
very well-directed yorker, homing in on the toes, all the batsman can do is dig the ball out and protect his wicket
another yorker. Gul sending them down at will here. Again the ball is just about squeezed out. Not too much you can do with that as a batsman.
full and on the pads, clipped through the on side. Pakistan's bowlers all going for yorkers here
full and outside the off, Gambhir opens the face of the bat and runs the ball through point
very full and on the leg stump, defended back down the pitch
slower ball, short and a bit of width, cut over the infield towards the sweeper on the off side
low full-toss on the pads, whipped through the on side
another heave over the leg side, no real contact. thick inside edge down towards square-leg
quick swinging ball on the off stump, skewed away off the leading edge to the off side
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to the fielder at third-man and once again just a single
Release! Gambhir lines this one up and hits it baseball style over the leg side. That's off the meat of the bat. Powerful drive over the leg side and the ball thuds into the scoreboard!
low full-toss on the off, attempted yorker, nurdled to the leg side
fullish and on the off, Rohit gives himself a bit of room and drives this through cover. There is a fielder on the ropes.

Another! low full-toss on the pads, another attempted yorker. Gambhir anticipates the length and plays the paddle sweep. The ball flies to Mohammad Asif at short fine-leg and he takes a sharp catch. India's topscorer is gone and this innings is fast losing momentum
full-toss, it's quite high though, slogged away through midwicket. Welcome boundary for India
another full-toss, his one homing in on Rohit. He moves to leg, opens the face of the bat and chops the ball down past short third-man. Quality shot this.
yorker jammed in on the pads, dug out to the vacant mid-on region and there'll be runs here
full and on the pads, Rohit gives himself some space to free his arms and drives through midwicket
yorker jammed in on the pads from around the stumps, all Irfan can do is defend this back to the bowler

full-toss just outside the off, driven inside out through cover for a couple more. Just one over left now and you have to think India are a bit short of what they would have liked from this innings after winning the toss and choosing to bat
low full-toss on the stumps, driven inside out over the fielder at cover, couple of runs more to the total but no boundary
slower ball, on the stumps, Rohit waits on the ball and hits it to midwicket. Hafeez is there and should take it ... No! He gets hands to it but ends up palming the ball over the ropes
fullish and on the stumps, dug out to the leg side
full and on the off, big swing, off a thick inside edge down towards square-leg
fullish and outside the off, Rohit walks across and tries to lap the ball of the man at short fine-leg. Off a leading edge towards third-man
full-toss on the pads, Rohit comes down the pitch and slaps that back down the ground. A couple of bounces and to long-on as India end on 157
